import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { Form ,Col } from 'reactstrap'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import { CommunicationStayPrimaryLandscape } from 'material-ui/svg-icons'; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ button: { margin: theme.spacing(1), }, input: { display: 'none', }, })); class Addemployee extends Component { state={ Employee:[], Adding:{ row_id:0, emp_id:'0', emp_name:'xyz' } } componentDidMount() { this.getEmployee(); } getEmployee = _ => { fetch('http://localhost:4001/Employee') .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => this.setState({ Employee:response.data })) .catch(err => console.error(err)) } addAdding = _ => { const {Adding} = this.state; console.log(this.state); fetch(`http://localhost:4001/Employee/add?row_id=${Adding.row_id}&emp_id=${Adding.emp_id}&emp_name=${ Adding.emp_name}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(this.getProducts) .catch(err => console.error(err)) } renderAdding = ({row_id,emp_id,emp_name }) =>
{emp_name}
render() { const { Employee, Adding } = this.state; return (

Employee Details

{Employee.map(this.renderAdding)}
this.setState({Adding: {...Adding,row_id: e.target.value }})} type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="First Name" />
this.setState({Adding:{...Adding,emp_id: e.target.value }})} type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Last Name" />

this.setState({Adding:{...Adding,emp_name:e.target.value }}) } type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Date of Joining" />
{/*








*/}
    
); } } export default Addemployee;
